<cs> my lords may i echo the admiration expressed by my noble friend and the other two noble lords for the part played by lord soames and all those associated with the exercise <e> <s> it really has been an exemplary exercise in democratic procedures <e> <s> may i also send good wishes to the new state of zimbabwe <e> <s> my noble friend has noticed as i noticed this morning that the word used by mr mugabe in relation to the future was togetherness <e> <s> if that is in fact the touchstone which he and his government are going to apply to their policies then there is a hope for a multiracial state and a prospering state in the new zimbabweand we must all hope that that will in fact be so <e>
